gen:link.msg:message: res_v1073-15: T_20.04 [{(if(exists($a) and (xfi:fact-has-explicit-dimension($a[1],QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))) and not(matches(string(xfi:fact-explicit-dimension-value($a[1],QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))),'x0'))) then(xfi:fact-explicit-dimension-value($a[1], QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))) else(if(exists($a) and (xfi:fact-has-typed-dimension($a[1],QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCR')))) then (xfi:fact-typed-dimension-value($a[1], QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCR'))/*[1]) else ('NA')))}], if there is any value reported in columns 0030 or 0040 or 0050, then columns 0020; 0030; 0040; 0050; 0090; 0100; 0110; 0120; 0130; 0140; 0150; 0160; 0170, 0180, 0190, 0200, 0210 must be reported. {17 - count($b)} out of 17 fields are missing.
